Package rubank

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
pizzapizza.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
A class representing a database of bank accounts.
Author:
Sibi suriyanarayan Tiruchirapalli venketaramani, Rahulraj Rajesh

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Finds the index of the given account in the array.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to search for.
      Returns:
      The index of the account, or -1 if not found.

    • findDuplicate

      public boolean findDuplicate(Account account)
      Checks if the given account already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check for duplicates.
      Returns:
      true if a duplicate exists, false otherwise.

    • findDuplicateChecking

      public boolean findDuplicateChecking(Account account)
      Checks if there is a duplicate checking account with the same holder in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The checking account to check for duplicates.
      Returns:
      true if a duplicate checking account exists, false otherwise.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the capacity of the accounts array by 4.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Checks if the database contains the given account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check for.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists in the database, false otherwise.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Opens a new account and adds it to the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the account is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Closes the given account and removes it from the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be closed.
      Returns:
      true if the account is successfully closed, false otherwise.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Deposits money into the specified account and updates its attributes.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to deposit money into.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Withdraws money from the specified account if sufficient funds are available.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to withdraw money from.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal is successful, false otherwise.

    • sortArray

      private void sortArray()
      Sorts the accounts in the database based on account type and holder's profile.

      Returns:
